pkgmetadata.longdescription: dyplot======matplotlib-like plot functions for dygraphs.js c3.js. See `dygraphs.com <http://dygraphs.com>`_ and `c3js.org <http://c3js.org>`_.Interactive out of the box: zoom, pan and mouseover are on by default.Drag your mouse to zoom in and double click to zoom out.You can clone the source code from https://github.com/blacksburg98/dyplotThe document is http://dyplot.readthedocs.org/The series needs to be pandas.Series
